mapper.insert: insert into customers (cust_id, cust_name, address, phone) values (${custId}, #{custName}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers where cust_id like ${custId}
select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers where cust_name like '%' || #{custName} || '%'
select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers where address like '%' || #{address} || '%'
select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers where phone like '%' || #{phone} || '%'
select cust_id custId, cust_name custName, address, phone from customers
mapper.delete: delete from customers where cust_id like ${custId}
